title: Create Bubble

fields.label: Bubble Title
fields.name: bubble_title
fields.instructions: Want to sell something or rent it out? Have something that the neighbours can borrow? Or just want to market your service to other locals... select the type of classified above and add the details below.

fields.label: Enter a message, text, statement or even a joke below
fields.name: bubble_title

fields.label: Upload a voice message for others to hear
fields.name: image

fields.label: Upload Media or Add Media URL
fields.name: media_location

fields.label: Information about something
fields.name: bubble_title
fields.instructions: Fill in the fields below to create Information that can be accessed by the Community.

fields.label: Chatroom Title
fields.name: bubble_title
fields.instructions: Create a realtime chatroom that only those nearby can access...

fields.label: Advert - Text
fields.name: bubble_title
fields.instructions: Enter the text to be displayed as the advert

fields.label: Advert - Image
fields.name: image
fields.instructions: Upload your Advert below to display it to the Community

fields.label: Social Media Post or Web URL
fields.name: url_type

fields.label: Alert Message
fields.name: bubble_title
fields.instructions: Notify the Community in real-time by entering an alert below.
fields.default_value: Write your message here to alert those nearby

fields.label: Ask the Community a Question
fields.name: bubble_title
fields.instructions: Enter your question below and the community will answer it.

fields.label: Url
fields.name: url
fields.placeholder: Please include the http:// prefix in order for links to work

fields.label: Post Social Media (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram etc)
fields.name: url
fields.instructions: You can share your social media posts (old or current) simply by pasting the posts url here.

fields.label: Add Form, Questionnaire, Poll or Survey
fields.name: content
fields.instructions: You can add your pre-created forms, questionnaires, polls and surveys here. Forms can be created and results viewed or exported via the desktop client.

fields.label: Profile Title
fields.name: bubble_title
fields.instructions: Market your choosen profile to those nearby...

fields.label: Attach the following social profiles.
fields.name: profile_data_sources
fields.instructions: The details (urls) for these social network profiles can be added via 'My Profile' in the main app menu. If they are not set they will not appear. The first one is for showing the profile that you signed up with (if available).

fields.label: Select a Topic
fields.name: forum_id
fields.instructions: Forums and topics can only be created by Premium, Corporate or Administrative users. The idea is to engage users by offering discussions about things that matter...

fields.label: Tribe Description
fields.name: content
fields.default_value: This is a description about a tribe.

description: These are the fields used to create content (bubble types).  All fields requierd by the create bubble UI (beyond Standard WP) are managed here.

title: App Settings

fields.label: Init API Poll Rate Max Value
fields.name: setting_init_api_poll_rate_max_value

fields.name: setting_data_api_poll_rate_max_value

fields.name: setting_user_api_poll_rate_min_value

fields.label: User Dynamic API Poll Rate Max Value
fields.name: setting_user_api_poll_rate_max_value

fields.label: User Registered
fields.name: content_registered
fields.default_value: The user has successfully registered. Welcome.

fields.label: Popup Error Text
fields.name: content_popup_error_text
fields.default_value: This app is temporarily unavailable due to maintenance. Please try again later.

fields.label: Popup Signal Text
fields.name: content_popup_signal_text
fields.default_value: This app requires a data signal to work. Please wait for a signal.

fields.label: Popup Wifi Text
fields.name: content_popup_wifi_text
fields.default_value: This app requires a data signal to work. Please wait for a signal.

fields.label: Filter Menu Button Icon Tint Colour
fields.name: filter_menu_button_icon_tint_colour

fields.label: Filter Menu Active Button Icon Tint Colour
fields.name: filter_menu_active_button_icon_tint_colour

fields.label: Filter Menu Close Button Icon Tint Colour
fields.name: filter_menu_close_button_icon_tint_colour

description: These are the core app fields including build info, default settings and UI styling etc.

title: Bubble Invisible Meta UI
description: These are fields that alow users to interact - including liking etc. They are data fields only and for use in code only. Non UI based.

title: Bubble UI

fields.label: Bubble For Sale Show Card Footer
fields.name: bubble_for_sale_showcardfooter

fields.label: Bubble For Rent Show Card Footer
fields.name: bubble_for_rent_showcardfooter

fields.label: Bubble For Service Show Card Footer
fields.name: bubble_for_service_showcardfooter

description: These are the UIs for the different Content types. Card based currently, you can adjust each Bubble types UI.

title: Directory
description: These are the additional meta fields added to manage a listing within the app (ie. a local businesses contact details)

title: Page Options
description: These are the additional metafields associated with an App Page. HTML or Native page rendering etc is controlled via these fields.
